channel.title: Help plssss
channel.description: Ive spent the last week making my server perfect- doner area, new commands and everything. Its just i can only use ip 127.0.0.1 ! how do i get other people on my server! PLS HELP!!! :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:

Read full topic

item.title: Help plssss
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

pwndscape:

perfect- doner area, new commands and everything. ]

That takes like, 10 minutes…

Plus make sure your no-ip is set up, and you portforwarded.

For a no-ip register at www.no-ip.com and register, then you have to create a domain (YourNameScape.no-ip.biz) and then download the client and put it online.

To portforward, try checking the tutorial section, but do this…

Start>Run then type in Cmd and in the cmd that opens, type in
/ipconfig
or
ipconfig
and it will give you your default gateway, type that into a web browser and it will bring up your router page.

For further help check the tutorial section.

Read full topic

item.title: Help plssss
item.dc:creator: @_BOOM .:BOOM:.
item.description:
@_BOOM wrote:

Download No-ip DUC. Add your ip (e.g pwndscape.no-ip.org) Then portfoward it with Utorrent or with your Router. Look in the Tutorial Section for more help.(Look at the stickies :rolleyes:)

Read full topic
